text: HC Riviera Chișinău, also known as Riviera-SSSH-2 is a Moldovan handball team located in Chișinău. They compete in the National Super League of Moldova. ==European record == {| class="wikitable" ! Season ! Competition ! Round ! Club ! 1st leg ! 2nd leg !
